Package uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.Christofides

Class Christofides

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.Christofides.Christofides
  • public class Christofides
extends java.lang.Object
    Class implemeting the Christofides Algorithm on an instance of the Traveling Salesman Problem

      • getEulerCircuit

        private int[] getEulerCircuit​(GraphNode[] nodes)
        Builds the union of MST and MATCH, which is a multi graph
        Parameters:
        nodes - Multigraph with only even degree nodes.
        Returns:
        Euler circuit with shortcuts

      • buildMultiGraph

        private GraphNode[] buildMultiGraph​(int[][] match,
                                    int[] mst)
        Builds the union of MST and MATCH, which is a multi graph
        Parameters:
        match - The "minimum" perfect match on the set of odd nodes.
        mst - The minimal spanning tree
        Returns:
        One dimensional nodes matrix representing the multi graph

      • buildWeightMatrix

        private double[][] buildWeightMatrix​(double[] x,
                                     double[] y)
        Builds up the weightmatrix from the coordinates. Calculates distance between all pairs.
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinates
        y - Y-coordinates
        Returns:
        Two-dimensional weightmatrix.

      • prim

        public int[] prim​(double[][] wt,
                  int dim)
        Using Prim's algorithm to find the Minimal Spanning Tree.
        Parameters:
        wt - Weightmatrix.
        dim - Number of dimensions in the problem.
        Returns:
        The parentvector. p[i] gives the parent of node i.

      • greadyMatch

        public int[][] greadyMatch​(int[] p,
                           double[][] wt,
                           int dim)
        Finds a match between the nodes that hava odd number of edges. Not perfect that gready, that is take the shortest distance found first. Then the next shortest of the remaining i chosen.
        Parameters:
        p - Parentvector. p[i] gives the parent of node i.
        wt - Weightmatrix of the complete graph.
        dim - Number of dimensions in the problem.
        Returns:
        Two dimensional matrix containing the pairs. Two columns where each row represent a pair.

      • buildRoute

        private java.util.ArrayList buildRoute​(Node _root)
        Activates the treetraversing-routine that builds the path given by DFS.
        Parameters:
        _root - The root which is the start node of the route.
        Returns:
        The route which is the order of nodes after the traversing.

      • findOddDegreeNodes

        private java.util.ArrayList findOddDegreeNodes​(Node _root)
        Activates the routine that finds vertexes which have odd number of edges.
        Parameters:
        _root - Startnode.
        Returns:
        List of nodes with odd number of edges.
